ModMetaData.name: 目标线 Target Line
ModMetaData.author: RunningBugs
ModMetaData.description:
画一条线从所有小人指向其目标，非敌方单位是绿色，蓝色，青色；敌方单位是红色，橙色，紫色。方便敌人来袭的时候观察敌人的目标。
Draw a line from all pawns to their target, non-enemy units are green, blue, cyan; enemy units are red, orange, purple. It is convenient to observe the target of the enemy when the enemy is attacking.
可以在模组设置中设置是否显示。
You can set whether to display in the mod settings.
